name: Perdition
blurb: Perdition is an Action/Adventure Side Scroller by Brooklyn based Abandon Hope Games. For $20 get a limited run concept art print signed by the artist!

rewards.reward:
With our appreciation, you’ll also get some goodies from us:

Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper • A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL (keep it tasteful!)

With our heartfelt appreciation, we’ll provide you with the following:
Your name in the game credits • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

With our gratitude, you’ll receive the following:
A limited edition concept art print featuring one of the creatures or vistas in our game, signed by the Artist • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

With our absolute delight, you’ll receive the following:
A collectible T-shirt designed by creator Max Drzewinski featuring art inspired by one of the 7 Deadly Sins (1 of 7 designs, randomly selected) • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

With our unabashed glee, you’ll receive the following:
Your Choice of 1 collectible T-shirt design by creator Max Drzewinski featuring art inspired by one of the 7 Deadly Sins (1 of 7 designs) • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	A limited edition concept art print featuring one of the creatures or vistas in our game, signed by the Artist
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

With our utter joy, you’ll receive the following:
Set of 3 Concept Art Prints, Signed by the Artists • An invitation to audition for the voice of a character in the game • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

With our love, we’ll send you the following:
Signed original Perdition concept art • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	A collectible, T-shirt (choose 1 of 7 designs)
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

With our love and affection, we’ll carefully send you the following:
A signed, original watercolor painting by creator Max Drzewinski • Choice of 3 collectible T-shirts from the Seven Sins collection • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

Once we finish jumping for joy – you’ll be provided with the following:
Your face mapped to a character in the game • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	Signed Perdition concept art
•	Total of five collectible,  “7 Sins” T-shirts
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

As we pray for your good health and success, we’ll send you the following:
A posed statuette of a boss character from Perdition • The complete set of collectible Seven Sins T-shirts • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	A signed, unique watercolor painting by creator Max Drzewinski
•	Signed Perdition concept art
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL

Once we revive from having fainted from pure jubilation – we’ll send your way the following:
A unique posed statuette of Adam, the protagonist of Perdition • The complete set of collectible Seven Sins T-shirts • Your face mapped to a boss character in the game! • You also receive the goodies described above:
•	A Posed Statuette of a Boss
•	A signed, unique watercolor painting by creator Max Drzewinski
•	Signed Perdition concept art
•	Your name in the game credits
•	Access to VIP Website Gallery and Exclusive Perdition Wallpaper
•	A special “Thank You” listing on AbandonHopeGames.com, including your URL
